益.definition: benefit; profit; advantage; beneficial; to increase; to add; all the more

益加.definition: increasingly; more and more; all the more

益州.definition: name of old state in modern Sichuan

益智.definition: to grow the intellect; Alpinia oxyphylla, a type of ginger (Chinese medicine)

益發.definition: increasingly; more and more; ever more; all the more

益陽.definition: see 益陽市|益阳市[Yi4yang2 Shi4]

益陽市.definition: Yiyang, prefecture-level city in Hunan Province 湖南省[Hu2nan2 Sheng3]

益鳥.definition: beneficial bird (esp. one that preys on insect pests or mice)
